t.t-foreach: o.payment_line_ids.filtered(lambda l: not l.is_main and l.display_type not in ['asset_cash', 'advance', 'counterpart'])

t.t-value: dict(accounts_summary, **{account_key: dict(accounts_summary[account_key], entry=entry_val, exit=exit_val, balance=entry_val - exit_val)})

span.t-att-class: 'text-success' if (total_entries - total_exits) > 0 else 'text-danger' if (total_entries - total_exits) < 0 else ''

span.t-esc: o.amount * (1 / o.manual_currency_rate if o.manual_currency_rate_active and o.manual_currency_rate else o.currency_id.rate)

- Solicitud de Anticipo No.
- Orden de Venta No.
